hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a #Big Skulltula# guarding a Gold one.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: You found a spiritual Stone! By which I mean, I worship Nayru.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #2# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the path to #the Key#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Statue Room Invisible Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ocarina#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Slingshot Room Side Chest

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #2# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Water Temple Small Key# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #a Red Rupee# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Huge Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key# can be found in #the Market#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right hand# is #a Game Key#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that Phantom Ganon is a big Louisa May Alcott fan.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ocarina#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Ice Cavern#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 5 Bottom

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Green Rupee# and #the Sun's Song#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Darunia's dance# leads to #the Hover Boots#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Red Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.
